definition: waist purse (old)/(fig.) purse/pocket/waist pack/fanny pack/bum bag
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
to dip into one's pocket/to pay out of pocket/to foot the bill

sentences.english: This was key to managing the investors and opening more pockets of finance.
sentences.chinese: 这就是管理投资者和打开更多金主腰包的关键。

sentences.english: An administration official said the Obamas would foot the bill for the celebrations.
sentences.chinese: 一个政府官员说，奥巴马要为聚会活动自掏腰包。

sentences.english: This surplus value is you think is profit into your own pockets.
sentences.chinese: 这剩余价值被您认为是利润塞入您自己的腰包了。

sentences.english: The money was all pocketed by corrupt officials.
sentences.chinese: 这些钱都进了贪官污吏的腰包。

sentences.english: A: I have a tuition scholarship from the university. Otherwise I’m on my own.
sentences.chinese: 学校只让我免缴学费，其余还是自掏腰包。
余下的就都进了方的腰包。

sentences.english: She has been compelled to dub up out of her own pocket.
sentences.chinese: 她被迫自己掏腰包付了账。

sentences.english: It bypasses banks and money markets, and puts money directly into people’s pockets.
sentences.chinese: 它绕过银行和货币市场，把钱直接塞进人民腰包。

sentences.english: All business returns of production go to the profit of the colonialists.
sentences.chinese: 生产的全部利润都入了殖民主义者的腰包。

sentences.english: Misers put their back and their belly into their pockets.
sentences.chinese: 守财奴宁可打赤膊饿肚皮，也舍不得掏腰包。

sentences.english: Wine and wenches empty men's purses.
Better yet, a lot of customers pay out of pocket.
sentences.chinese: 更有利的是许多客户都是自掏腰包支付费用。

sentences.english: I have a tuition scholarship from the university. Otherwise I'm on my own.
sentences.chinese: 学校只让我免缴学费，其余还是自掏腰包。

sentences.english: In fact, if you could you would pay to be on Oprah.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，如果你可以，你会自掏腰包上奥普拉的节目。

sentences.english: The policeman lined his pockets by taking bribes.
sentences.chinese: 那个警察接受贿赂肥了自己的腰包。

sentences.english: Do you think that men should always pick up the tab on a blind date?
sentences.chinese: 你认为男女经人介绍初次约会时都要由男的掏腰包吗？

definition: embroidered pouch for carrying loose change etc/purse/pocket (in clothing)
bag or purse etc/small bump or pimple/hillock
supplementary cash reserve/private fund/private hoard/slush fund
full and bulging (of a pocket, pouch etc)
